title: Homecoming
description: Dr. Quinn Cantrell made a life for himself in Seattle when he left behind his picturesque hometown — and the unhappy memories of a relationship that ended tragically. His grandmother's death is an unexpected blow, but there are even more surprises waiting — including a mischievous puppy, a reunion with his far-flung siblings, and an old acquaintance who's grown into a gorgeous and capable woman.Nikki Brockington was proud of the work she'd done at The Silver Spoon, and when the Cantrells leave its management in her care, she's happy to take on the responsibility. But keeping the inn and its restaurant profitable isn't her only challenge — not when she can't stop thinking about Quinn, who reminds her that home is more than a place. It's who you love...
author: Lacey Baker
